Grouped_Utterances: Mostly about my nightmares and how I felt after them.   Yeah, I noticed that I often write about feeling trapped or scared.   It feels like I’m releasing some of the pressure.   I’ve been writing about my feelings during the day and how they relate to my nightmares.   I think I need to reach out to my family more. I’ve been isolating myself.   I guess I’m just afraid they won’t understand.   I’m still struggling with anger sometimes, especially when I think about what happened to me.

I did! I told him I’ve been feeling a bit off lately, and he was really understanding.   It felt good. I was nervous at first, but I’m glad I did it.   Just that I’m trying to work through some things and could use their support.
I’ve been trying out the journaling, and it’s been helpful.   I think it’s helping me understand myself better.   Yes, but I felt a bit more prepared for them.
